text: Holcopasites calliopsidis is a species of cuckoo bee in the genus Holcopasites in the family Apidae. It is found in Central America and North America. == Hosts == H. calliopsidis is a known cleptoparasite of Calliopsis andreniformis.Hurd, P. D., Jr., and E. G. Linsley. (1972). Parasitic bees of the genus Holcopasites Ashmead. Smithsonian Contributions to Zoologyno. 114: 1-41.Packer, Laurence., Genaro, J. A., & Sheffield, C. S. (2007). The bee genera of eastern Canada. Canadian Journal of Arthropod Identification, 3(3), 1-32. Psuedopanurgus sp. may also be hosts of H. calliopsidis. thumb ==Subspecies== * Holcopasites calliopsidis calliopsidis (Linsley, 1943) * Holcopasites calliopsidis carinatus (Linsley, 1943) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * Category:Nomadinae Category:Insects described in 1943
title: Holcopasites calliopsidis
